Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;hops^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

For the next steps you'll need some ^orange;hops^white;. I think you can buy some seeds at ^green;Terramart^white;. Make them grow and gather at least ^orange;2 hops^white;. Because without hops, we get no beer. And without beer we cry.
That's a good start. Be sure to keep some wheat as you'll need it next.
